Uses of Class
org.fluentjdbc.DbContextSqlBuilder

  • Packages that use DbContextSqlBuilder 
    Package Description
    org.fluentjdbc
    Fluent JDBC is a micro ORM - a library to help you generate and execute SQL statements with JDBC.

    • Uses of DbContextSqlBuilder in org.fluentjdbc

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      DbContextSqlBuilder DbContextSqlBuilder.from​(String fromStatement)
      Replace the from part of the SELECT ...
      DbContextSqlBuilder DbContextSqlBuilder.groupBy​(String... groupByStatement)
      Add the arguments to the column list for the SELECT ...
      DbContextSqlBuilder DbContextSqlBuilder.orderBy​(String orderByClause)
      Adds ORDER BY ... clause to the SELECT statement
      DbContextSqlBuilder DbContextSqlBuilder.query()
      Implemented as return this for compatibility purposes
      DbContextSqlBuilder DbContext.select​(String... columns)
      Build an arbitrary select statement, e.g.
      DbContextSqlBuilder DbContextSqlBuilder.select​(String... columns)
      Add the arguments to the column list for the SELECT column, column... statement
      DbContextSqlBuilder DbContextSqlBuilder.skipAndLimit​(int offset, int rowCount)
      Adds OFFSET ...
      DbContextSqlBuilder DbContextSqlBuilder.unordered()
      If you haven't called orderBy(java.lang.String), the results of DatabaseListableQueryBuilder.list(java.sql.Connection, org.fluentjdbc.DatabaseResult.RowMapper<OBJECT>) will be unpredictable.
      DbContextSqlBuilder DbContextSqlBuilder.whereExpressionWithParameterList​(String expression, Collection<?> parameters)
      Adds the expression to the WHERE-clause and all the values to the parameter list.
